mapper.insert: insert into post (writer_id, title, category, content) values (${writerId}, #{title}, #{category}, #{content})
mapper.select: select p.id, p.writer_id, u.nickname, p.title, p.category, p.content, p.hit, p.created_at, p.updated_at from post p join user u on p.writer_id = u.id where p.id = ${postId} and p.is_deleted = 0

select p.id, p.writer_id, u.nickname, p.title, p.category, p.content, p.hit, p.created_at, p.updated_at from post p join user u on p.writer_id = u.id where p.category = #{category} and p.is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: update post set hit = hit + 1, updated_at = now() where id = ${postId}
update post set is_deleted = 1, updated_at = now() where id = ${postId}
